title: Doping ban overturned for some Russian athletes
text:
Doping ban overturned for some Russian athletes 2:10pm GMT - 01:38 
The world's highest tribunal for sport has upheld the appeals of 28 Russian athletes, although it's yet unclear if they'll compete in the upcoming Winter Olympics. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
The world's highest tribunal for sport has upheld the appeals of 28 Russian athletes, although it's yet unclear if they'll compete in the upcoming Winter Olympics. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2DV0t3z
